mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.commodity_id AS "commodityId", a.critical AS "critical", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_item_commodity_persons( id, commodity_id, critical, quantity, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{commodityId}, #{critical}, #{quantity}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ser_item_commodity_persons SET commodity_id = #{commodityId}, critical = #{critical}, quantity = #{quantity}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
